text.body:
the cake was decadent! thank you! sorry I didn't call you last nite, but I fell asleep while I was working. you wore me out!
have a good day,
em
The report named: NG - PROPT P/L , published as of 11/07/2001 is now available for viewing on the website.

,
The day after Thanksgiving is NXB4. We (Price-Desk) have some special procedures we have to follow regarding swaption expiration. Other than that, it should not be that different from a non-bidweeek day. I apologize, I thought the 23rd was going to be NXB3.
In December, the day after Christmas (Wednesday) is NXB2 and the Friday before that is NXB3. Monday and Tuesday are exchange holidays.
Thanks,
The report named: NG - PROPT P/L , published as of 10/30/2001 is now available for viewing on the website.
The report named: NG - PROPT P/L , published as of 11/01/2001 is now available for viewing on the website.
The report named: NG - PROPT P/L , published as of 11/06/2001 is now available for viewing on the website.

You doubt my stamina & my prowess in holding my liquor--et tu Brute??!!! I'm not feeling too bad - considering the time I got home. I didn't want to wake you. I've been doing the meeting circuit again this morning, so that has kept me lively. The post lunch period when things are quiet is going to be brutal though.
How is your day going?

Attached, please find the book request in response to 's e-mail. Please call w/ any questions.
Thanks,
, X5-8274
The report named: NG - PROPT P/L , published as of 10/22/2001 is now available for viewing on the website.
The report named: NG - PROPT P/L , published as of 11/05/2001 is now available for viewing on the website.
EPMI-LT-WHALW-PRC and OIL-NG-HDG-CD-X-GDL are Lavorato books. The other two are prepay books and are not associated w/ a given trader.

,
Can you do me a favor. The Reward Bucks application I filled out, was for . I will be out all of next week. If you get it next week can you have it sent to her. She sits behind me at 3249B. Her extension is X5-8091.
Thanks,
, X5-8274

Francis,
Could you do this again for me please. The post i.d. is 1403067. The month is February 2003.
Thanks,

,
Can you give a call and get him what he needs. I don't know anything about the request. I gave him some of ours and he needed one of yours.
Thanks,

,
Leg B has already terminated (06/30/1999), and legs 9 and C are in Canadian books. I left a message w/ book admins in Canada. As soon as they get w/ me I'll run a minibook for you on those 2 deals.
The report named: NG - PROPT P/L , published as of 10/19/2001 is now available for viewing on the website.

This looks like the macro problem we talked about. Let me know what I need to do to fix.
Thanks,
, X5-8274

,
I am not able to calc using the shortcut on my desktop. I can copy the Post-ID and set it up. When I try to calc I get a message saying, "unable to connect". Can you please help?
Thanks,

I read it this morning. It's absolutely brutal towards the end. We'll talk more offline--if you know what i mean.
e

There is no deal in system for a Cal `02 swap. Can you give me details on the deal (when done, price, vol., etc.)?
Thanks,

,
I sent them early Sunday from my ev1 account. I get all your e-mails at that account (errol@ev1.net). I haven't been back to check my e-mails since then. Please find them attached again. Sorry for the inconvenience.
just got w/ my source and she told me same thing. it's called luna mora. sound like a good spot. if you want to meet up there, I'm game. let me know what time.

,
After we spoke tonite, I found an error on a Bravo Natural Resources deal we put in last week. This is the deal where we spaced out the premium over Cal`02 & `03. A premium was inadvertantly added on the sale leg of the deal. Taking off this premium resulted in a $448,773 loss. I apologize for the error. We just found it today, when was catching up from being out on Th & Fri.
Thanks,
The report named: NG - PROPT P/L , published as of 10/29/2001 is now available for viewing on the website.
The report named: NG - PROPT P/L , published as of 11/08/2001 is now available for viewing on the website.
The report named: NG - PROPT P/L , published as of 11/21/2001 is now available for viewing on the website.
The report named: NG - PROPT P/L , published as of 11/26/2001 is now available for viewing on the website.

,
Can you please send Swinney the post i.d for the "ENA-FT-WT-ENA" as of 09/28/2001. He is fulfilling an Andersen request.
Thanks,

I am sorry. I wasn't trying to push Meliza into our lunch. That's why I was asking how much 'shop' you wanted to talk. I feel awful now. I thought it would be fun. We can grab a conference after we get back (or tommorow) and talk if you'd like.
Unfortunately, we have been put on a hiring freeze b/c of everything that is going on. We brought on three new people on Monday, but they were interviewed and hired about 1 month ago. We've lost three people since the merger announcement, but we cant fill their spots w/ new people.
Your resume looks good. You're correct, these jobs are demanding on your personal time. This is especially true when you first start. This is something you would have to talk over w/ the manager that you interviewed with to see how demanding the book is that they wanted to put you on. We can talk more later.
Thanks,

The report named: NG - PROPT P/L , published as of 11/08/2001 is now available for viewing on the website.
(Revision: 3)
The report named: NG - PROPT P/L , published as of 11/19/2001 is now available for viewing on the website.

,
I know you're pretty busy w/ everything going on, so this isn't top priority. When you get a minute, could we talk about how Spec/Sr.Spec get into the Associate/Analyst program? My guys (and myself for that matter) have seen and heard of people moving into the program and I am getting a lot of questions on the matter.
Thanks,
The Inland Production deal is a Crude deal. Please contact the Crude Oil desk. Sheetal Patel (the originator) is looking into the New Power deal.
The report named: NG - PROPT P/L , published as of 10/23/2001 is now available for viewing on the website.
The report named: NG - PROPT P/L , published as of 10/31/2001 is now available for viewing on the website.
The report named: NG - PROPT P/L , published as of 11/09/2001 is now available for viewing on the website.

,
I have placed the name of the book admin. by the corresponding book. Please call me if you have any questions at X5-8274.
Thank you,
McLaughlin

,
I heard there was a spot down here that was hot for MNF, but I don't know the name. I'm trying to find it now. I checked info for 'luna mara', but didn't find anything. I'll hit you back when I find it. My cell number is 713-870-8211, and my home is 713-528-1997.

Sheetal,
Please check below regarding the New Power deal and Credit Reserve. Let me know so I can grant tonite if this is valid for Credit Reserve.

,
EPMI-LT-WHALW-PRC GAS-ECT-STRATEG-PRC GAS-ENERGYAMER-PRC OIL-NG-HDG-CD-X-GDL
These should be included w/ the Natural Gas Financial Desk.
Thanks,
, X5-8274
FYI regarding day after Thanksgiving (closed) and trading hours (9am-1:30pm) for the rest of the year.

The report named: NG - PROPT P/L , published as of 11/08/2001 is now available for viewing on the website.
(Revision: 2)
